name: Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Belts Kids: Green
subtitle: Fight Gear / Jiu Jitsu / Gi
seo_title: Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Pearl Weave Belts: Black
seo_description: The BJJ / Jiu Jitsu Pearl Weave Belts are durable, affordable and traditional. They represent the hours, blood, tears and sweat spent on the mats since you've started your BJJ journey. Built to last and designed for heavy-duty daily training, simple look, and feel good on the mats. The pearl weave material allows the belt to be tied easier and stay tied.

name: Fluvium Abstract 2 in 1 Shorts
subtitle: Surf Gear
category1: Fight Gear / Jiu Jitsu / No Gi
seo_description: There's an artist in all of us. The Fluvium Abstract 2 in 1 Shorts is developed and designed by passionate artists in the hope of awakening the artist in you. Whether you choose to wear the shorts to train jiu jitsu, MMA, surf or even head to the gym to lift some weights, we hope you are inspired to step outside your comfort zone to try new moves, techniques or use new methods.

name: Fluvium Amateur Leather Shin Pads | White & Blue
subtitle: Fight Gear / MMA
seo_title: Fluvium Crisp White Leather Muay Thai, MMA & Kick Boxing Shin Guards
seo_description: The Fluvium Crisp White Leather Shin Guards provide maximum protection of the shin & ankle, even during your most powerful kicks, with a high density foam and specific reinforcements placed at each joint. The Fluvium Crisp White Leather Shin Pads have a Velcro closure system that provides superior wrist support maximizing the power of strikes and prevention of injuries.

name: Fluvium Armour Mouth Guard: Black
subtitle: Fight Gear / MMA
category3: Fight Gear / Jiu Jitsu / No Gi
seo_description: Protect your mouth from unexpected punches with the Fluvium Armour Series Mouthguard. The mouthguard features a shock-absorption inner layer surrounded by a rigid outer layer specifically designed for upper and lower jaw protection. The mouthguard offers a customized fit with a boil and bite design for just the right fit.

name: Fluvium Athletic Finger Tape | Pack of Three | 0.25" x 82'
subtitle: Athlete Wellness
seo_description: Curtail Plastic, Save Environment: We have embarked on an ambitious mission to exclude any plastic in our packaging or storage. To that end we are introducing jute drawstring bags to house your BJJ Gi's/Boxing Gloves & MMA Gloves. By using or promoting the use of these jute bags, not only will you be supporting the environment, but also small scale artisans who depend on this for their livelihood.
